data.title: rediscovering our old favorite
data.text: As the BR nearest our home was no longer, we'd not had BR for years.... then decided to drive a bit and get some. WELL worth the drive. Seasonal specials, healthier options, outstanding service and the old favorites as well. We shall never again wait so long.

data.title: Great Ice Cream,
data.text: Wonderful treat on a hot day.  We went on a very hot day in Salem and really enjoyed the cool dessert.  I had the Raspberry Cheesecake ( or it might have been strawberry) whatever it was, I loved it.
